channel.title: The Ender
channel.description:
If it turns out that the only way to access the ender is through a stronghold, that means that would normally would be no chance of world 2 having an ender portal.
Im asking is if it does turn out that way, would it be possible for mitb to create an ender portal himself at spawn?

item.title: The Ender
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I’m sure with bukkit and multi-world I can create the portal out of anything and make it go anywhere.

Read full topic

item.title: The Ender
item.dc:creator: @Nokturth Nokturth
item.description:
@Nokturth wrote:

mitb can spawn the blocks and make a portal at spawn; it’s not only a matter of w2, but of w1 too.
also, if there was a stonghold now in w2, we’d need to look for anotherone because it’d be generated with no portal in it.

Read full topic

item.title: The Ender
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

Moparisthebest:

What the hell is the ender?

you mean to tell me you havent kept up with the new developments?

Apparently theres going to be a new realm called the ender, its supposed to be an alien world with alienlike creatures such as endermen and ender dragons, and the only way to get to the ender is through a portal that can be found in a stronghold, the blocks for the portal to the ender are unbreakable and have to be activated using eyes of ender

thats why i was asking, because weve already found out there isnt going to be a stronghold in w2 simply because the 1000x1000 area hasnt yielded a stronghold

Read full topic
